Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Render/renderSave

Function void renderSave(Figure fig, loc file)
Description Render figure fig and write it to the location file. The file name extension determines the output format. Currently supported formats are:
  • .png: PNG
  • .tiff: TIFF
  • .jpeg: JPEG
Pitfalls Rendering to file is not yet perfect:
  • In some cases the screen picture and the picture that is written to fileare not 100% identical.
  • The rendering of fonts is really bad.
